title: BBC Realms of the Russian Bear 5of6 Siberia The Frozen Forest Xv
description: Realms of the Russian Bear Nature Documentary hosted by Nikolai Drozdov, published by BBC in 1992 - English, Russian Multilanguage narration http://docuwiki.net/images/6/6b/Realms-of-the-Russian-Bear-Cover.jpg Information ------------------------------ A series on the wildlife and landscapes of the former Soviet Union, presented by Nikolai Drozdov, who was awarded the Golden Panda Award (which is called the "Green Oscar") for this work. 1) Green Jewel of the Caspian This episode shows the verdant beauty of the wetlands surrounding the Caspian Sea. 2) The Celestial Mountains Creatures of the USSR's remote mountains ranges, high deserts & inhospitable soda lakes. 3) The Red Deserts The arid central deserts of the former USSR, & the animals that live in these harsh lands. 4) The Arctic Frontier The Arctic tundra bursts into life in summer, a bounty of flowers, birds & grazing herds. 5) Siberia the Frozen Forest Siberia has temperatures of -70C and is home to Baikal, the world's oldest, deepest lake. 6) Born of Fire Russia's Far East is home to a plethora of fauna, from sea eagles to Siberian tigers. Technical Specs ------------------------------ * Video Codec: Xvid * Video Bitrate: 2315-3718 kbps * Video Resolution: 720x544 * Video Aspect Ratio: 1.333:1 * Frames Per Second: 25.000 * Audio Codec: AC3 * Audio Bitrate: 192kb/s 48.0 Hz * Audio Streams: 2 * Audio Languages: English, Russian * RunTime Per Part: ~49 min * Number Of Parts: 6 * Part Size: 956MB-1.42GB
